Sentece: Its absolute bioavailability from the drug-diet mixture averaged 3% over the dose range tested.
Title: Bioavailability of isradipine in young and old rats: effect of mode of administration.
Name: Isradipine

Sentece: By gavage its bioavailability was enhanced to 5% of dose with peak plasma values approximately 7 times higher than from a comparable dose in the diet.
Title: Bioavailability of isradipine in young and old rats: effect of mode of administration.
Name: Isradipine

Sentece: The decline in plasma concentrations was biexponential, with a mean terminal half-life of 3.6-3.7 h after oral or intravenous dosing.
Title: Bioavailability of isradipine in young and old rats: effect of mode of administration.
Name: Isradipine

Sentece: Using a two-way analysis of variance, no significant changes in apparent theophylline clearance were observed between placebo, and isradipine 2.5 and 5 mg (0.815 +/- 0.164, 0.870 +/- 0.212, and 0.827 +/- 0.164 ml/min/kg, respectively; p = 0.136).
